CustomField.description: Selecting the Household Name option excludes this Contact from the Household Name. NOTE: The Household Formal Greeting and Household Informal Greeting options are not currently tied to existing product functionality.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Selecting the Household Name option excludes this Contact from the Household Name. NOTE: The Household Formal Greeting and Household Informal Greeting options are not currently tied to existing product functionality.
CustomField.label: Naming Exclusions
